posts.author: darktwist1
posts.content: Hello! I am looking for a Arcane Archer build for the Arelith server. Fighter/Bard/AA or other such build that will be good in PVP and PVM. Going for 11 AA lvls for +6 arrows. Thank you!

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
I could put together a Fighter 8 / Bard 8 / AA 14 for you. Since neither Fighter nor Bard is the Elf's favored class, you would have to keep them even with each other to avoid a 20% EXP penalty.

How about Rogue 14 / Wizard 1 / AA 15? You would get Epic Dodge, and almost as importantly, Uncanny Dodge to keep your DEX AC when flat footed. You would also get more Tumble AC, and Rogue skills are nice to have.

EDIT: Never mind the Rogue / Wizard / AA build. It isn't legal on Arelith because of the 3-levels-the-first-time-you-take-a-class rule. Complying with the rule would be very costly, and would ruin the build.

posts.author: King Midas
posts.content:
Hey Empyre65,
What do you think about the Rogue 16 Ranger 3 AA 11. On arelith you can use Ranger instead of an arcane class for a prerequisite. There is also a type of elf where Ranger will not give you multiclass penalties.

Midas

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Either Rogue 16 / Ranger 3 / AA 11 or Rogue 13 / Ranger 3 / AA 14 should work nicely. The first option will have more skill points and 1 more die of sneak attack damage, and the second option will have 1 more AB.
